subtitle.es: Ya escuché el nuevo album y te traigo una reseña personal y sin maquillaje sobre el disco final de la banda que marcó mi adolescencia y me acompañó toda la vida. Un cierre digno, honesto e inevitable.
subtitle.en: I have listened to the new album and bring you a personal and unfiltered review of the final album from the band that shaped my adolescence and stayed with me throughout my life. A worthy, honest, and inevitable ending.
